title: Eva Longoria goes makeup free in casual ensemble in Beverly Hills after jetting back from NYC
text:
She was a glamour goddess at a New York awards event on Tuesday.

But by Thursday Eva Longoria had jetted back across the country and was glimpsed looking casual as could be in Los Angeles.

The 44-year-old Desperate Housewives icon wore a flowing grey print jumpsuit and went for a minimal look with her makeup.

Out of New York: By Thursday Eva Longoria had jetted back across the country and was glimpsed looking casual as could be in Los Angeles

Slinging on a black leather quilted Chanel cross-body bag, she accessorized with a pair of shades that matched her black slippers.

On Tuesday night Eva swung by the swank Mandarin Oriental Hotel in Manhattan to be honored at the Women's Media Center awards gala.

Jane Fonda and Gloria Steinem started the organization in 2005 with Robin Morgan, an ex-child actress who became a poet and activist.

On the move: The 44-year-old Desperate Housewives icon wore a flowing grey print jumpsuit and went for a minimal look with her makeup

Eva was awarded for being part of a group including Ugly Betty star American Ferrera who organized the Querida Familia Latina (Dear Latin Family) campaign.

They managed to collect over 200 signatures of Hispanic celebrities including Jennifer Lopez and Hamilton impresario Lin-Manuel Miranda on a letter advocating for 'community members following ICE raids, the El Paso shooting, and reports of migrant detention conditions.'

Last June, Eva gave birth to her firstborn child, a son called Santiago whom she shares with her husband Jose 'Pepe' Baston.

Place to be: On Tuesday night Eva swung by the swank Mandarin Oriental Hotel in Manhattan to be honored at the Women's Media Center awards gala

Top brass: Gloria Steinem (left) and Jane Fonda started the organization in 2005 with Robin Morgan, an ex-child actress who became a poet and activist

The Empire guest star married hunky Mexican actor Jose in 2016 in the Mexican town Valle de Bravo, which enjoys dazzling views of Lake Avandaro.

Jose and his ex-wife Natalia Esperon already share two daughters and a son, prompting Eva to tell ¡Hola! during her pregnancy: 'We have three children already, I have three stepchildren so it’s not like it’s anything new'.

Meanwhile, Eva was previously married to soap star Tyler Christopher from 2002 until 2004, then to pro basketball player Tony Parker from 2007 until 2011.

Baby mine: Last June, Eva gave birth to her firstborn son Santiago whom she shares with her husband Jose 'Pepe' Baston; she is pictured with him last month at Paris Fashion Week
